DOC.brief_summary: The investigators hypothesize that Arixtra patients will be less likely to experience wound infection than patients who have received low-molecular weight heparin, coumadin or aspirin with mechanical compression.
DOC.brief_title: The Effects of Arixtra on Wound Drainage Following Total Joint Arthroplasty
DOC.criteria: All primary unilateral TKA and THA cases will be included. Patients less than 50 kg, Patients with CrCl<30ml/min. Revision and bilateral procedures will be excluded.
